name: Keep Bouncing Back
description:
Bouncy wants to reach the top of the mountain.
Jump over walls, over pits, fall back down, make super jumps & wall jumps, and fall back down..... Easy to play, but hard to master, a real rage game!

Use checkpoints as training, or try the real pro speedrun game! 

Use arrows (or a/d) to rotate, space to go back to checkpoint

Also available on Android (perhaps in the future also iOS)

promo video:  

Inspired by: 

  • Getting over it with Bennet Foddy
  • Cleaning the system
  • Stick with it
